name: Cream Cheese Swirl Brownies
description: Brownies, meet cheesecake. Two awesome treats coming together in one epic dessert! Rich, chocolaty brownies and creamy cheesecake swirls give it a show-stopping presentation. Give them as gifts or serve them for guests—just be prepared for all the “oohs” and “aahs” from your family and friends!
preparation: Preheat oven to 350˚ F. Lightly oil Square Steamer; place on 1⁄4 Sheet Pan.

In a large bowl, combine mix and melted butter. Add 2 eggs, milk, and 1 tsp vanilla extract. Stir until well combined. Reserve 2⁄3 cup of batter and set aside. Scrape remaining batter into steamer; spread out evenly.
In a small bowl, beat cream cheese with sugar. Beat in remaining egg and 1⁄2 tsp vanilla extract until smooth. Pour over batter in steamer and smooth out to the edges.
Using 1 heaping tbsp as a guide, dollop reserved brownie batter over cream cheese mixture. Use a butterknife to cut through the batter to make swirls.
Bake, uncovered, 35 min, or until edges are golden and toothpick comes out mostly clean, with a few crumbs on it. Let cool before slicing.

products.name: Fudgy Brownie Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: We’ll let you in on a little secret: You can make the fudgiest, chocolatiest brownies ever in the microwave in just 4 minutes (or 20 minutes in the oven)! Just add a few simple ingredients to our gluten free batter and let the magic unfold in your Multipurpose Steamer. When ready, slice ‘em up any way you like – on their own, topped with ice cream or icing, in a sundae, or as a dessert base.

products.name: Square Steamer
summary: Cook desserts, healthy meals and side dishes in minutes in your microwave!

products.name: 1/4 Sheet Pan (Set of 2)
summary: Smaller size than a standard sheet pan for easy handling.
